attributes.action: Find out if Russia is fuelling Brexit for its own benefit and who is complicit.
attributes.additional_details:
An article was published in the Byline times which suggests the possibility that Brexit’s destabilisation of the UK and EU is fuelled by Russia and Benefits Russia.

https://bylinetimes.com/2019/04/17/how-farages-campaign-colluded-with-putin-to-weaponise-hate-and-islamophobia/

There is a possibility that Russia may have undue influence over the UK and the US and at best they gain financially and at worst this could be preparation for upcoming wars. Russia has five years ago invaded the Ukraine.
attributes.background: Please start an inquiry to find out if Brexit benefits Russia’s power and position towards the UK and the EU, and which British Nationals, including politicians, have knowingly colluded with Russian interests against the UK and EU to our disadvantage/peril. Then take legal action against them.
